field.name: type_ids
field.eval: [(4, stage_id) for stage_id in [ref for ref in [ ref('industry_fsm.planning_project_stage_0', raise_if_not_found=False), ref('industry_fsm.planning_project_stage_1', raise_if_not_found=False), ref('industry_fsm.planning_project_stage_2', raise_if_not_found=False), ref('industry_fsm.planning_project_stage_3', raise_if_not_found=False), ref('industry_fsm.planning_project_stage_4', raise_if_not_found=False), ] if ref]]
